faq.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
faq.description: We've gathered the most common questions from our clients so you can clear up any doubts.
faq.q1: Do I need to book an appointment or can I walk in?
faq.a1: We always recommend booking in advance to ensure availability and personalized care. You can book through the form on our website, WhatsApp or phone.
faq.a2: Yes! The first evaluation consultation is completely free and with no obligation. We assess your needs and recommend the most suitable treatment.
faq.q3: How long does each treatment session last?
faq.a3: It depends on the treatment chosen. On average, sessions range from 30 minutes to 1.5 hours. During the evaluation consultation we'll inform you of the exact duration.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash, debit card, MB Way and bank transfer. We also offer payment plans for treatment packages.
faq.q5: Are the treatments safe and are there side effects?
faq.a5: All our treatments are performed by certified professionals with approved products and equipment. During the evaluation consultation we explain everything about the treatment, including any post-session care.
faq.q6: Can I gift treatments to someone?
faq.a6: Yes! We have gift vouchers available for any treatment or value. It's a great way to surprise someone special. Contact us for more information.
